title: sv2022
author: sv2022
created_time: November 03, 2022, 12:10:41 PMLast edit: December 03, 2022, 01:21:35 AM by sv2022
content: Hi! I want to offer you my services in writing articles. I can write on any niche and I have a long experience in writing online. My prices start at 2$/100 words. If you want a long term collab, I am the right person for you and we can also negotiate on the price.  I accept any kind of payment, just PM me and we will talk.I also want to offer 3 people here the chance to try my service for free by offering them one 500 words article. The only requirement I have is to leave here a review with their opinion of the article.  Hope I can work with you! Have a nice day!Here are some examples of my previous work, just to make an idea:QuoteYou probably already heard about bitcoin and its rising value. On January 1st 2017, one bitcoin was worth $1,000 and since then it went to $19.000 in December 2017, and lost more than 50% during the first part of 2018. The story of bitcoinA person, or a group named Satoshi Nakamoto invented bitcoin in 2009. The main goal of this project was to create a “new electronic cash system” that is decentralized. After he managed to came up with this new technology, Nakamoto gave this source code to others in the bitcoin community and decided to vanish. What is bitcoin?It is a digital currency which doesn`t need any coins or bills to be minted or printed. The owners of bitcoin are anonymous and instead of using social security numbers, tax IDs and names, bitcoin connects the buyers to the sellers through encryption keys. Bitcoin is mined by powerful computers that are connected to the internet. Bitcoin is mined by doing a combination of record-keeping and advanced math. When someone sends a bitcoin to somebody else, the network records that transaction and all the other transactions that are made in the same time. The “miners” which are actually computers running special software inscribe these transactions in a gigantic digital ledger. The blocks that are generated by miners are known as the “blockchain”. The miners convert this blocks by using special hardware into sequences of code. Producing hash requires some serious computational power and a lot of miners compete in order to do it. As time goes by, the amount of the awarded bitcoins decreases. What determines the value of bitcoin?The value of bitcoin is determined by what are people willing to pay for it. The value of bitcoin is similar to what happens on stocks. Satoshi Nakamoto made a protocol which stated that only 21 million bitcoins can ever be mined and about 12 million have already been mined. There is a limited supply of bitcoins. This is what makes bitcoin different from stocks. Value is opened to interpretation without a central authority controlling the supply.The volatility of bitcoin also invites manipulation and also speculation this is why it is a great idea to don`t mortgage your house in order to buy bitcoins. How to buy bitcoin?There are a lot of digital currency exchanges on the market which you can choose from such as CEX, Kraken, Coinbase or Coinmama. Coinbase is the largest and most established of them where you can easily buy, sell and also store bitcoins. Is bitcoin legal?The short answer for this question is: Yes, but as any currency available on the market, the answer is yes if you don`t do illegal things with it. For example, bitcoin was the only currency used on Silk Road for purchasing drugs and other illicit goods or services. As it attracts more mainstream attention, bitcoin is always under increased scrutiny. Are there any risks?Yes, when you wake up in the morning, you will probably see another price of bitcoin. The financial value of bitcoin is volatile and may swing a lot from day to day. QuoteWedding planning can be a hard thing to do because there are a lot of things every couple should consider.Savepaper.work helps you in organizing your wedding while offering your guests all of the info they need. It can be hard to know everything about your guests and this is why a better organization is a thing you should consider.Creating a modern and beautiful wedding website is a solution for you to get to know your guests. Thanks to this service you can learn a lot of things about the people who will attend your event and you can make your decisions based on that. You will receive feedback and this will help you in proper organizing your wedding.It is important to know everything about your guests to make their stay at your wedding as pleasant as possible.How does it work?In short, the service helps your guests in knowing everything about the wedding. You can start using this website for free and without any additional costs, just to get an idea of how it works.You can try it out by configuring your very own wedding page without having to pay any of your money. This is the place where you can create your wedding page and you can use all of the tools that the platform offers you to personalize your page the way you would like. You can create something truly special by using this service and create yourself a great looking website.The invitation system is another addition that you will like a lot. For each of your guests, an invitation will be generated. By using the code that the platform has generated the guests can access and start browsing the website to see what options they have. The platform is also great because of its simplicity which means that your guests will like what they will see. They can have multiple choices and they will learn a lot of things about your wedding. They can also tell you the info you need to properly organize yourself. Keeping track of your invitations is a thing that this system offers for everything to work smoothly. This is how you can see everything from confirmations, to declines and many other things. It is important to keep yourself informed about your guests and everything they like and dislike to make yourself a great memory.Keeping your guests informedThe info should be available for your guests and this is why you should keep them informed at any time. They should know everything about the date and how much time is left until the wedding. The platform tells them the days, hours and minutes until the event. You need to keep your guests informed about the most important day of your life.After the wedding, you will keep the website which will be a great memory that you will cherish for a long period of time.PrivacyAnother important thing that this service offers you is the privacy you truly need. The only persons who can see the page will be your guests. The platform works in a way that focuses on privacy which means that every person logged in to your website will have his or her code generated and sent directly to them. They can be sure that no other person will have access to their private info and everything will be secured.FAQ and guests feedbackYour guests will have a lot of questions and this is the reason why it is so important to have their questions answered right away. You can easily define the questions you want your guests to answer. You can for example ask your guests if they are vegetarians or how they would like the event to be organized. Some beverage-related questions can also be asked. It is up to you to find the right questions for the people who will come to your wedding.Defining FAQs and also other custom questions will be a thing that you can do. You can also have a gallery where guests can easily contribute with their images and videos.Deciding what questions you would like to ask your guests is an important step to getting yourself organized as well as possible and this is a thing you can take into consideration. You can easily create a FAQ for your guests to learn a few things about your wedding before they will attend it. Some of your guest's questions will be answered in advance this way and they will also know what to expect from your wedding.LocationsYour guests will also learn a lot of things about the locations in which they will attend. This is important for your guests and they will learn in advance about the locations. You can easily create a photo gallery together with your guests. If they want to post some pictures it will be possible to do so. There are a lot of other possibilities that you can take into consideration when it comes to building yourself a website like this. You can start using it for free.Steps to use our serviceEven if you plan your wedding yourself or go for professional wedding planners, you can use a service like this. Create yourself a modern and beautiful wedding page!Organization is a thing to take into consideration because you have to keep everything on track when you are faced with decisions, lists, and other things. You should be well informed when it comes to your wedding and a service like this can help you out in taking the best decisions.Set yourself a budgetThis is one of the most important factors to take into consideration. Make sure that your wedding budget is in check and take your decisions based on this budget. If your family will contribute to the wedding budget, be sure to ask them how much because you need to keep everything organized. When it comes to budgeting, you will also have to be prepared for a reality check. A lot of couples don’t realize the costs of a wedding.You need to think about your prioritiesAnother thing that you have to do before the wedding is that you need to sit down and think about all of the priorities you will have. You have to consider all of the most important aspects of your wedding and based on these aspects you can take the right decisions. Prioritizing the details and taking into consideration that you will probably have to compromise will be some things you need to consider. All of these things will help you to stay within the budget and it will be easier for you to manage to organize things better.The bridal styleYou also need to take into consideration the bridal style. There are a lot of resources available online from which you can take some inspiration. You can go visit Pinterest, read magazines, and even try out what Instagram suggests to you. Start researching right away to find out what fits you the best. You don’t want to overwhelm yourself with all of the wedding inspiration that’s out there. Creating some Pinterest boards can also help you out in deciding the best outfit for you.Organize everythingThis is the most important thing before a wedding and we can tell you that we can help you with that. You can plan everything and after that manage every aspect of your wedding online. A wedding website can be exactly what you need to keep everything organized and this is why you should certainly use it. If this is not included in your planning, you should consider it because it is really hard to keep everything in check as you plan forwards. There will surely be some things you will forget and this is why organizing everything is an important part of your wedding.You can use our service to create a beautiful wedding site and you will manage to take advantage of all of the functions it offers. Your guests will also feel welcomed knowing that they can attend the event after completing the feedback. Keeping everything simple and ready for your guests will be a fun experience to handle and both you and your guests will love it.Track everything as you goYou need to track everything when it comes to your wedding so be prepared to do so. Always make lists and be ready for things to change. You need to prioritize your goals as you will be making these lists, but try not to be overwhelmed with everything all at once. Keep track of everything you do and don’t forget about guests' requests as you will be approaching your wedding.Think about different datesTry to be as flexible as possible here when it comes to the dates you are choosing. Take into consideration all of the factors involved in organizing your wedding. Think about everything when it comes to the dates. These dates can be quite popular and usually when you organize your wedding at a popular date, you may have to pay more. Also keep in mind that if your dates will be difficult for your guests to attend, there will be fewer guests. You should aim for a date which is perfect for everyone.Select the desired themeYou can easily select a theme for your date. Choose a concept design and stick to it. Think of an aesthetic that you should consider and stick by it.Other things to considerThink of your guest lists because this can be a complicated process. You can sit down with your partner and key family members to put down a list of guests. You will probably need to make some cuts and you will also have to decide if you will invite children or not.A great idea to keep in mind is to talk with a married couple. They will give you an insight into how their wedding went and they will probably offer you some tips and tricks about their wedding. You should also take into consideration that family and friends are your best resources and you should ask them for advice.Before signing a contract, you should read it carefully and watch every detail of the contract. Make sure that you will be arranging every detail there because if you have issues with the contract, you will not be protected. Include everything in the contract such as your date, location, and also time and deposits.You should consult with your partner to decide the size of your wedding. Keep every expense in mind and find out the things that work well for both of you. Think of all of the aspects and you will be able to create a really special day for yourself.Why consider a wedding site?A wedding site can help your guests a lot. It is important to create a wedding site for you and your guests to check out the details of your wedding. This is the service we are offering and you will be able to keep up with all of the wedding-related details. You will manage to keep your guests informed at any time and they will know everything about your wedding.Creating a timetable will be easy and you can define locations and also times. Linking the locations to the website can be done fast. You can link everything with Google maps. Places like the Church, the location homepage, and other things can be listed on the wedding site. Another thing you can do is to define love-story points. Your story will be shared this way and your guests will also know a few personal details about your relationship. Make sure that every guest will know everything important about the wedding such as dates, times, locations, and dress codes. Everything from transportation to lodging will be there for your guests to know. On the welcome page of the website, you should write the most important things your guests should know and the contact forms they need to keep in touch with you. You should plan everything for your wedding and Savepaper.work is the first step to take into consideration.
